sledgehammer.plugin

Class SQLiteModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • sledgehammer.util.Printable
      • sledgehammer.plugin.Module
        • sledgehammer.plugin.SQLiteModule

  • public abstract class SQLiteModule
extends Module
    Module sub-class to handle SQLite operations and utilities.
    Author:
    Jab

        public boolean setSchemaVersion(int version)
        Sets the schema version of the SQLite database File.
        Parameters:
        version - The Integer version to set.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the schema version is successfully applied to the SQLite database File.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

                                      java.lang.String fieldName,
                                      java.lang.String type)
        Parameters:
        table - The 2D String Array of the table definition to check.
        fieldName - The String field name to test.
        type - The String type to verify.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the field exists in the given SQLite table, and that it is the type given.

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAll(java.lang.String tableName,
                                               java.lang.String targetName)
                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        tableName - The String name of the SQLite table.
        targetName - The String column name in the SQLite table to grab for each row definition.
        Returns:
        Returns a List of String definitions for each row in the SQLite table column targeted.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown when SQLite fails to execute queries or statements.

      • getAll

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getAll(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                                               java.lang.String[] targetNames)
                                                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        tableName - The String name of the SQLite table.
        targetNames - The List of String names of the target columns in the SQLite table to grab.
        Returns:
        Returns a Map of String column names, that points to a List of definitions for each row in the SQLite table.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown when SQLite fails to execute queries or statements.

      • getRow

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getRow(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                               java.lang.String matchName,
                                                               java.lang.String matchValue)
                                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns a map of the first matched row of a given table.
        Parameters:
        tableName - The String name of the SQLite table.
        matchName - The String name of the column of the table to search for the value given.
        matchValue - The String value given for the column to match.
        Returns:
        Returns the Map definition of the row definition in the SQLite table with each String column as the key, and the String definition as the value.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown when SQLite fails to execute queries or statements.

      • getRow

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getRow(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                               java.lang.String[] matchNames,
                                                               java.lang.String[] matchValues)
                                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns a map of the first matched row of a given table.
        Parameters:
        tableName - The String name of the SQLite table.
        matchNames - A List of String names of the columns of the table to match.
        matchValues - The List of String values of the columns to match. (This must be the same length as the List prior.
        Returns:
        Returns a Map of the first row that matches the column definitions given with each String column as the key, and the String definition as the value.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown when SQLite fails to execute queries or statements.

      • getAll

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getAll(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                                               java.lang.String matchName,
                                                                               java.lang.String matchValue,
                                                                               java.lang.String[] targetNames)
                                                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        tableName - The String name of the SQLite table.
        matchName - The String column of the table to match.
        matchValue - The String value of the column to match.
        targetNames - A String Array of target columns to retrieve definitions.
        Returns:
        Returns a Map of all rows with the target column matching the value given. The Map stores each targeted column as the key to a List of String definitions for each defined column in the given Array sequentially.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown when SQLite fails to execute queries or statements.

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAll(java.lang.String tableName,
                                               java.lang.String matchName,
                                               java.lang.String matchValue,
                                               java.lang.String targetName)
                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        tableName - The String name of the SQLite table.
        matchName - The String column name to match.
        matchValue - The String definition to match.
        targetName - The String target column definition to return.
        Returns:
        Returns a List of String definitions for the target column.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown when SQLite fails to execute queries or statements.

      • get

        public java.lang.String get(java.lang.String tableName,
                            java.lang.String matchName,
                            java.lang.String matchValue,
                            java.lang.String targetName)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        tableName - The String name of the SQLite table.
        matchName - The String column to match.
        matchValue - The String definition to match.
        targetName - The String targeted column to return.
        Returns:
        Returns the String value of the first matched row in the table with the given column target with the value provided.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown when SQLite fails to execute queries or statements.

      • hasIgnoreCase

        public boolean hasIgnoreCase(java.lang.String tableName,
                             java.lang.String matchName,
                             java.lang.String matchValue)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        tableName - The String name of the SQLite table.
        matchName - The String column to match.
        matchValue - The String definition to match.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the table contains a row that matches the value without being case-sensitive.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown when SQLite fails to execute queries or statements.

      • has

        public boolean has(java.lang.String tableName,
                   java.lang.String matchName,
                   java.lang.String matchValue)
            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        tableName - The String name of the SQLite table.
        matchName - The String column to match.
        matchValue - The String definition to match.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the table contains a row that matches the value. (Case-Sensitive)
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown when SQLite fails to execute queries or statements.

      • has

        public boolean has(java.lang.String tableName,
                   java.lang.String[] matchNames,
                   java.lang.String[] matchValues)
            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        tableName - The String name of the SQLite table.
        matchNames - A String Array of the columns to match.
        matchValues - A String Array of the definitions to match. (The Array must be the same length of the prior)
        Returns:
        Returns true if the table contains a row that matches all columns and the definitions provided.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown when SQLite fails to execute queries or statements.

         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Sets a definition for each SQLite table row with the provided required column definitions.

        table - The String name of the SQLite table.
        matchName - The String column to match.
        matchValue - The String definition to match.
        targetName - The String targeted column to define.
        targetValue - The String definition to set.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown when SQLite fails to execute queries or statements.

                java.lang.String matchValue,

        matchName - The String column to match.
        matchValue - The String definition to match.
        fields - A String Array of columns to define.

        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown when SQLite fails to execute queries or statements.
